name: A Berry Magical Game
description:
100% of assets in the game (art, music, writing, code, graphics, etc.) were made during the duration of the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam (o7.11 ~ o7.13).

📖 STORY

Your berry friends are fending off attacks from fruity foes in their magical garden. But as you begin to help their cause, you soon begin to realize, the horde is never-ending! When will the enemies stop spawning?! 

JAM THEME:  Each level will introduce a more difficult level by joining another tile to your existing map. 

🕹️ GAME CONTROLS

WASD - moves screen 
Mouse scroll wheel - zooms in and out of the map
Left mouse click (Tower Cards) - place and move turrets
Right mouse click - cancels turret placement

🎮 INSTRUCTIONS

  Strategically place towers around the map to defeat the fruity foes that spawn at portals
  Each new level will generate a new tile to be added to the map and difficulty increases
